name: laravel/laravel
description: The skeleton application for the Laravel framework.

post-autoload-dump: @php -r "if (!getenv('SKIP_ARTISAN')) { passthru('php artisan package:discover --ansi', $e); exit($e); } else { fwrite(STDOUT, 'Skipping artisan package:discover'.PHP_EOL); }"
post-update-cmd: @php -r "if (!getenv('SKIP_ARTISAN')) { passthru('php artisan vendor:publish --tag=laravel-assets --ansi --force', $e); exit($e); } else { fwrite(STDOUT, 'Skipping artisan vendor:publish'.PHP_EOL); }"
post-root-package-install: @php -r "if (getenv('USE_DOTENV')==='true' && !file_exists('.env')) { copy('.env.example', '.env'); fwrite(STDOUT, 'Created .env from .env.example'.PHP_EOL); } else { fwrite(STDOUT, 'Skipping .env creation'.PHP_EOL); }"
post-create-project-cmd: @php -r "if (getenv('USE_DOTENV')==='true' && !getenv('SKIP_ARTISAN')) { passthru('php artisan key:generate --ansi', $e); exit($e); } else { fwrite(STDOUT, 'Skipping key:generate'.PHP_EOL); }"
@php -r "if (!getenv('SKIP_ARTISAN')) { passthru('php artisan migrate --graceful --ansi', $e); exit($e); } else { fwrite(STDOUT, 'Skipping migrate'.PHP_EOL); }"
